Report generated: 2025-12-01 03:29:36

======================================================================
Test Case 2 (3D): The 'Standing Wave'
======================================================================

Isotropic diffusion with forcing and homogeneous Neumann BCs.
Exact solution: u = exp(-t) * cos(pi*x)*cos(pi*y)*cos(pi*z)
Forcing: F = (3*pi^2 - 1) * exp(-t) * cos(pi*x)*cos(pi*y)*cos(pi*z)
Time range: t in [0, 2]

======================================================================
SPATIAL CONVERGENCE STUDY
======================================================================
  Grid  11^3: dx = 0.100000, L-inf error = 1.158861e+02, L2 error = 5.361552e+01
  Grid  16^3: dx = 0.066667, L-inf error = 1.344904e+02, L2 error = 5.691805e+01
  Grid  21^3: dx = 0.050000, L-inf error = 1.436101e+02, L2 error = 5.812907e+01
  Grid  31^3: dx = 0.033333, L-inf error = 1.525513e+02, L2 error = 5.904669e+01
  Grid  41^3: dx = 0.025000, L-inf error = 1.569443e+02, L2 error = 5.939678e+01

----------------------------------------------------------------------

----------------------------------------------------------------------
    Grid 1     Grid 2   dx ratio   L-inf rate    L2 rate
----------------------------------------------------------------------
